entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
